comprehensive_overview: Regtools is a command-line tool and Python library for manipulating sequence alignments (SAM/BAM/CRAM), variant call files (VCF/BCF) and genomic annotations in the standard genomic file formats. It provides various utilities for filtering, sorting, comparing, and annotating genomic data to assist in the analysis of high-throughput sequencing data.
core_features: Manipulation of sequence alignments and variant call files
Filtering, sorting, and comparing genomic data
